thread.title: Alabama basketball picked to finish near bottom of SEC
thread.title_full: Alabama basketball picked to finish near bottom of SEC

author: Matt Zenitz | mzenitz@al.com
title: Alabama basketball picked to finish near bottom of SEC
text:
Comments 
Media members that cover SEC basketball see Avery Johnson getting off to a rocky start at Alabama. 
Entering its first season under Johnson, Alabama was picked to finish 13 th out of the SEC's 14 teams. 
The Tide were ninth in the SEC last year under former coach Anthony Grant, finishing 18-14 and 8-10 in the SEC. 
Kentucky was picked to win the SEC. 
LSU freshman Ben Simmons was named the preseason SEC Player of the Year. 
No Alabama players were named first- or second-team All-SEC. 
The Tide open their season against Kennesaw State Nov. 13.
